name: Generic sildenafil
title: Prescribing of generic sildenafil
as a percentage of prescribing of all drugs for erectile dysfunction
description: as a percentage of prescribing of all drugs for erectile dysfunction
why_it_matters: The main drugs used to treat erectile dysfunction are probably equally effective (CKS 2014).
Currently sildenafil is significantly cheaper than other drugs, and therefore should probably be considered as the first-line agent.
